node.text: Gina Chersevani (@mixtressdc) runs one of the coolest spots around, @BuffaloBergenDC, where you’ll find everything from fountain drinks to cocktails, all served alongside bagels, knishes, latkes, and more. Pull up a virtual seat at their bar, and if you’re in DC, be sure to swing by and check out their offerings. 📹 @buckbaymedia

node.title: Throwing it back to one of our 2019 #Imbibe75 People to Watch.

node.text: @ShihoFukada filmed this beautiful video about shochu’s history and culture, how it’s made, and how to use it in cocktails—it will instantly transport you to Japan and inspire you to try shochu yourself. And to learn more about Japanese shochu, be sure to follow @jss_shochu. #shochu #shochucocktail #jss_shochu #partnerpost #imbibe #imbibegram

node.title: The story of Japanese shochu is rich and layered.

node.text: Brewing a batch of Chemex coffee every morning is one of our favorite daily rituals. The classic brewer is a cinch to use, but there are a few little tricks to getting it just right, so our friends @AllegroCoffee put together a helpful how-to. Check it out before you brew your next batch! #chemex #coffeebrewing #coffeefliicks #imbibe #imbibegram

node.text: Lately, we’ve been daydreaming about traveling to Charleston and taking a seat at #TheLivingRoom bar @TheDewberryCharleston, helmed by @prettyprettyryancasey. Join us on a virtual trip to one of our favorite cities and bars. #charlestonsc #charlestonlife #hotelbar #imbibe #imbibegram 📹 @buckbaymedia

node.title: What bars and cities do you miss visiting these days?

node.text: Figuring out the right grind for your favorite brewing methods is key, so our friends @allegrocoffee put together this handy video to break it all down. #coffeefliicks #coffeeathome #coffeegrinder #imbibe #imbibegram

node.title: Have you dialed in your daily coffee grind?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 19, 2021 tagging @erikbadkins, and @slanteddoor. May be an image of drink.

node.text: Adapted by Erik Adkins from a recipe in The South American Gentleman’s Companion by Charles H. Baker Jr., the Pisco Apricot Tropical featured on the menu of @SlantedDoor subtly tweaks the classic formula, yielding a vibrant sip of summer. Recipe link in our profile! 🎨 @mattynewtonillustration

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 19, 2021 tagging @kemboocha. May be an image of 1 person and standing.

node.text: From counterculture darling to mainstream staple, kombucha has bloomed from an underground market to a $1.8 billion industry. Back in May, John Kessler explored kombucha’s rapid ascent for our May/June issue. Head to the link in our profile to read about how it came to dominate the RTD category, and how today's makers are putting their own unique stamps on the category, including @Kemboocha founder Kemiko Lawrence, pictured above. 📸 @andrewthomaslee

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Imbibe in Employees Only LA with @dushanzaric, and @employeesonlyla. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: Blackberries and elderflower richen this lovely vodka cocktail from @employeesonlyla—recipe link in our profile! 📸 @_mediumraw

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 16, 2021 tagging @dashfast. May be an image of drink.

node.text: One of our favorite swizzles for summer? This glorious mix of mezcal, sherry, lime, ginger, and falernum. Get the recipe from Danny Shapiro (@dashfast) via the link in our profile. 📸 @emmajanzen

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 16, 2021 tagging @sippingsocialite, @thehuesociety, and @wineculturefest. May be an image of bottle and text that says 'WINE & CULTURE FEST Presented y Hue Society ATLANTA 2021 KIMPTON OVERLAND HOTEL AUGUST 27-29 WINEANDCULTUREFEST.COM HUE Jo4cry'.

node.text: If you’ve read or followed Imbibe over the past few years, you’ve likely seen features about Tahiirah Habibi (@sippingsocialite), longtime wine professional, founder of @TheHueSociety, co-founder of the @RootsFund, and producer of the upcoming @WineCultureFest, a three-day curated experience centering Black and brown wine professionals. Happening in Atlanta, August 27-29, this event will showcase and celebrate truly incredible wines and the people behind them, and we are thrilled to be a media sponsor. If you live in or near Atlanta or plan to be there late next month, you won’t want to miss this event—tickets are on sale now, so head to the link in our profile to get yours today! 🍷

(RISING IN COMMUNITY EVERYDAY KIMPTON HOTEL 8/29 4PM 10PM R.I.C.E. AFTER PARTY 10PM CITY WINERY 12AM 8/29 ROSES & ROSÉ AWARDS BRUNCH 12:30PM 3:30PM CITY WINERY ROSÉ LOUNGE 3:30PM 7:30PM KIMPTON HOTEL KIMPTON HOTEL WINEANDCULTUREFEST.COM HUE Joiety **ALL PARTICIPANTS MUST BE AT LEAST 21 YEARS OF AGE'.
Photo by Imbibe in The Ryder Hotel with @lauceau, @holycityhandcraft, and @littlepalmbar. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: A little sweet heat courtesy of a green chile vodka meets the richness of passion fruit and papaya in this summer medley. Check out the recipe from Lauren Corriveau (@lauceau) for @LittlePalmBar via the link in our profile. 📸 @holycityhandcraft

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Imbibe in Phin with @phin.seattle. May be an image of one or more people, drink, food and indoor.

node.text: The sweet tang of Vietnamese yogurt mixes with robust coffee and a touch of whole milk and sweetened condensed milk in this delicious drink featured on the menu of @Phin.Seattle. Check out the recipe via the link in our profile, and be sure to read more about Vietnamese coffee culture from @DanQDao in the July/Aug issue and over at imbibemagazine.com. 📸 @AmberFouts

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 14, 2021 tagging @zayarum. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Nothing like a Daiquiri on a summer day, and this one is especially rich and smooth:
☀️
1 ½ oz. @ZayaRum Gran Reserva
¼ oz. demerara syrup (1:1)
½ oz. fresh lime juice
½ oz. fresh grapefruit juice
☀️
Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker with ice, then shake to chill. Strain into a chilled coupe, then garnish with a lime wheel.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Imbibe on July 14, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: Celery and cucumber make for super-refreshing, slightly savory drinks. For this zero-proof recipe, they combine with bitter lemon soda, which brings a perfect bittersweetness to the mix. Get the recipe from Benjamin Schiller for @HomesteadOnTheRoof via the link in our profile. 📸 @laraferroni

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 13, 2021 tagging @shaunlayton. May be an image of drink.

node.text: The Martini meets the G&T in this delicious mashup from Vancouver bartender @ShaunLayton—recipe link in our profile! 📸 @laraferroni

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Imbibe on July 13, 2021 tagging @copperandkings, and @alexanderbtwn. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: An emblem of summertime, blackberries are easily found sprawling their spiny limbs through riparian areas or, in their more sophisticated moments, adorning cocktail glasses in classics like the bramble or smash. Head to the link in our profile for 10 ways to make the most of their seasonal sweetness, like this mix of blackberries, @copperandkings brandy, merlot, lime, and simple syrup. 📸 Joseph Clagg

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Imbibe in Columbia Room with @mojalvo, @paultaylor703, and @columbiaroom. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text: Sherry and tequila get along swimmingly, and in this frozen Margarita from @ColumbiaRoom, the two join forces for a burst of summery goodness. “Sometimes two ingredients harmonize so well that it’s simply impossible not to put them together,” says general manager, Paul Taylor. Recipe link in our profile! 📸 @mojalvo
